title: India must use AI to make governance efficient, citizen-centric: Anthropic CEO

title: Summit may Issue Declaration for Democratised AI
description: With a focus on expanding the generational benefits of artificial intelligence to the Global South, the India AI Impact Summit, which opened in the National Capital on Monday, may culminate in a Delhi Declaration, said people with knowledge of the matter.
content:

title: Swarms of AI bots can sway people’s beliefs - threatening democracy
description: In mid-2023, around the time Elon Musk rebranded Twitter as X but before he discontinued free academic access to the platform’s data, my colleagues and I looked for signs of social bot accounts posting content generated by artificial intelligence. title: Artificial intelligence declaration signed by Canada, Germany

content:

title: Hollywood groups condemn ByteDance's AI video generator
description: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations.
content: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations that say Seedance 2.0 “blatantly” violates copyright and uses the likeness of actors and others without p... [2425 chars]

title: RailTel Hosts AI-Driven Healthcare Panels At India AI Impact Summit 2026 In Delhi
description: RailTel Corporation of India curated and hosted two panel discussions on AI-driven healthcare at the AI Impact Summit 2026 in New Delhi. Experts discussed using artificial intelligence to strengthen public health systems, improve accessibility and ensure inclusive healthcare delivery.
content: RailTel Corporation of India Ltd., a Navratna CPSE under the Ministry of Railways curated and hosted two important panel discussions on Artificial Intelligence–driven healthcare at the AI Impact Summit 2026, held at Bharat Mandapam. The mega summit w... [3596 chars]

title: Britain's PM Keir Starmer announces new regulations on AI chatbots
description: The British government will add new regulations to artificial intelligence chatbots to protect kids, Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced Monday.
content:
Feb. 16 (UPI) -- The British government will add new regulations to artificial intelligence chatbots to protect children and other users, Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced Monday.
"The action we took on Grok sent a clear message that no platform ... [2690 chars]
